data.title: המיטאפים והכנסים הופכים לוובינרים ואנחנו זורמים: הנה מבחר וובינרים טכנולוגיים שווים שיתקיימו בחודש הקרוב

paragraphs.context: Founders, CEOs and VPs of high-tech companies, startups and venture capitalists , we are honored to invite you to an Extends webinar on financial risk management with Joseph Fraiman, CEO of the Prico Group, a company that has been operating for over 40 years in the fields of risk management of foreign exchange, commodity and interest rate. The Prico team covers the needs of consulting and deal execution for leading Israel corporations as well as start-ups and funds.
